article_metadata.news-keywords: Renee, Ellmers, ACA, Obamacare, Republicans, US, rep, NC, North Carolina, insurance, Affordable, Care, Act
article_metadata.description: Republicans have come up with sketchy plans to replace the Affordable Care Act, and they haven’t figured out how they’ll prevent the 16 million Americans now covered through the ACA from losing their insurance.
article_metadata.title: Time for Ellmers to end the Obamacare bashing | News & Observer
